Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.p:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
S.W.C. Africa

L. de R. du Verge
To State Depart.
Despatch of same and departure of Vice Consul Robert S. Newton

United States Consulate
at St. Paul de Loanda S.W.C. Africa
June 13th 1882

The Honorable J. C. Bancroft Davis
Asst Secty of State
Washington D.C.

I have the honor to state that I arrived at my post via England on the 12th day of June 1882 and entered upon my official duty this date, and that Mr Robert S. Newton my Vice Consul leave by steamer tomorrow by reason of failing Health.

I have the honor
to be Sir
Your obedient servant
L. de R. du Verge
U.S. Consul
